version_description:
1.Support AirDrop to Send music file from Mac to app.
2.UI improvement.
3.Bug fix.
4.The Fourth Place is reserved for Arsenal, wish Wenger leave with a Cup!

This version fix some bugs and optimize experiences according to your feedbacks. Thanks you all.
1. fix the bug of playing some ape file.
2. add fade in and fade out effect when paly/pause music
3. extremly reduce the noise when change music
4. fix the minor seeking bug
5. optimize DSD playback effect。
6. fix some audio file duration display bug
7. optimize memory and CPU usage，less memory and battery consumption

Embrace the Significant Update!
1.File browser. You can preview file, delete file and add file to playlist by using file browser.
2.Sorting files by Name, Size and Modification Date
3.Optimizing the use of CPU and Memory
4.Sorting by track number in abum page
5.Minor bugs fixed

1.update decode engine.
2.optimize code
3.fix seeking to play bug
4.fix play cuesheet file problem
5.fix playlist update problem

What a glorious day! We know you've been waiting for this update to happen for so long. And in turn we wanted to bring you something worthy. So, fasten your seat belts, here we go.

1.Add visualizer.
2.Add equalizer, hundred settings of preset EQ, and you can save your custom EQ.
3.Random EQ for each song when playing

FIXED:
1.crash fixed
2.fixed album image display mirrored on iOS9
3.fixed display bug on song information view

We have prepared for this update for near one year to bring your with extraordinary visual and hearing feast.

1.Thousand of visualizations embedded in player which beat with music.Absolutely, It's one of the most advanced visualizer in the App Store.
2.Save current play music queue to playlist.
3.Fit UI for iPhone Xs Max and Xr
4.Fit iOS12

FIXED: 
1.Fixed interrupt problem with call.

And one more thing, we change the app name from Fancy to Everplay, So the slogan becomes: Ever play, never stop! Aha! That's it!

We have prepared for this update for near one year to bring your with extraordinary visual and hearing feast.

1.Thousands of visualizations embedded in player which beat with music.Absolutely, It's one of the most advanced visualizer in the App Store.
2.Save current play music queue to playlist.
3.Fit UI for iPhone Xs Max and Xr
4.Fit iOS12

FIXED: 
1.Fixed interrupt problem with call.
2.Wrong screenshot

And one more thing, we change the app name from Fancy to Everplay, So the slogan becomes: Ever play, never stop! Aha! That's it!

Happy new year guys! For this joy-able moment, we bring you a brunch of updates.
1. Support load music from iTune library
2. Support Carplay feature
3. Filter songs by library and Hi-Res
4. Index bar to location music conveniently
5. Support sort music by added date
6. You can remove your custom EQ setting
7. Pull to reload music library on iOS 11 and above
8. You can disable auto reload music library at setting page
9. Improve interruption handling
10. You can put image file with same file name(filename.jpg according to filename.ape) in the same directory to load as album image.
11. Bug fixed

1.Fix the problem of Local file manager doesn't show the song files.
2.Other minor bugs fixed.

1.More reasonable handle for msuic interruption
2.Support of multi-files CueSheet.
3.Other minor bugs fixed
Fix the  loading data problem with carplay.

Enjoy Music! Some bug have been fixed for you guys!
1.fix the problem of missing playlist items after reload all music library
2.fix the seeking slider jump occasionally when end tracking

We heard the song in chance.
1.You can disable text autoscrolling now.
2.Minor bugs fixes.
minor bug fixed.

Enjoy Music! A new feature has been added and some bugs have been fixed for you guys!
1.Adapt iOS13
2.Edit music album image in app
3.Edit music metadata in app
4.View music info in Songs page directly
5.Delete music file in Songs page directly
6.Add music to current playing list in Songs page directly
7.Add music to playlist in Songs page directly
8.View album image and save image to system album
9.Minor bugs fixed.

1.Add DoP support for DSD256(need support by external DAC).
2.Optimize CUP Usage.
3.Support Landscape mode for iPad.

EverPlay has been receiving a lots of 5 stars rating recently. Appreciated for your support and It's truely encourage us to make this App better and better!
1.fix minor UI bugs when searching.
2.fix Carplay bugs for playing music in Playlist and Category.

1.Present toast when play mode change
2.Add impact feedback
3.Add 3D Touch
4.Feedback improvement
5.Minor bug fixed

1. Speed up for launching
2. Access to Album and Artist Page in player view directly.
3. Happy birthday, Little Henry!
4.
5.
6.Manchester United:(

1. Speed up for launching
2. Access to Album and Artist Page in player view directly.
3. Happy birthday, Little Henry!
4. Fix UI bug
5.
6.Manchester United:(

We heard the song in chance.
1.You can disable text autoscrolling now.
2.Minor bugs fixes.

Enjoy Music! A new feature has been added and some bugs have been fixed for you guys!
1.Adapt iOS13
2.Edit music album image in app
3.Edit music metadata in app
4.View music info in Songs page directly
5.Delete music file in Songs page directly
6.Add music to current playing list in Songs page directly
7.Add music to playlist in Songs page directly
8.View album image and save image to system album
9.Minor bugs fixed.

1.Sorting bug fixed.
2.Output Device change do not pause music between Bluetooth devices
3.Select songs don't show check marker,fixed!

1.Add non-consumable in-app purchase
2.Fix a bug with editing DSF album image.
3.Fix a bug of soring
Fix in app purchase bug.
Fix problem that airdop files can't play when divice locked.

1.Minor bug fix.
2.Hide status bar when show fullscreen visulizer.

1.New player engine for playing.
2.Random play list without repetition
3.Better equalizer effect.
4.Add Recent play list
5.Improve the smoothness of switching between pages
6.New service for auto download album image
7.Support play file with “caf” and “opus” extensions
8.Fixed index bar display error when descend sorting by name
9.Bug fixed.
minor bug fixed.
Your gapless playback now available! And, resample quality can be selected!
We update lyrics support for embeded and local lrc lyrics. And more, your can add current playing music to My Favorite playlist.

1. Double tap on Songs’s navigation bar to locate to current playing music
2. Scroll album image to change music in player view
3. Add Fast forward and fast backward
4. Change playback rate
5. A→B repeat play
6. Minor bug fixed

1.Fix CarPlay loading problem.
2.Change Recent Playlist from Songs page to Playlist page.
3.Now you can drag and drop cell in playlist view to reorder.
4.In case of misoperation, double tap to change from lyrics and Artwork.

1. You can add music to queue to play next.
2. UI fix
3. Stability improve.
4. Add repeat music to playlist.
5. Disable/enable online lyrics.
Improve performance.

1. Play music through Siri command
2. Shortcuts support
3. Fix wrong display duration for DSD file
4. Optimize launch time
5. Optimize reload time
6. Support multiple windows for iPad OS
7. Rename file at info view
8. Select text decoding for metadata
9. Widget
Widgets bug fixed.

1. Support APE(Monkey's Audio) file which version above 3.99
2. Support play SACD(iso) file and DSD over PCM output.
3. Auto select meta data text encoding.
4. And other minor bug fix.

1.optimize player engine
2.minor bug fixed

1.Optimize player engine, CPU usage down by 10~20%.
2.Adjust player view layout
3.Playlist and category support sorting, searching and indexing.
4.Playlist can save last played time and continue play.
5.Save play count for music
6.You can sort by play count and rating in all songs page
7.Real-time DSD conversion.
8.Optimize using Siri and shortcuts to play music
9.Please join multiple artist with ; or &

1.Fix the bug that cannot change album artwork after purchase offline function.
2.Other minor bug fixed

1.Fix a crash on iOS12 when app start.
2.Add ARM Neon optimizations for PCM to DSD conversion
3.Use Accelerate Framework to reduce CPU usage when copy DSD buffers
4.Fix a frame loss bug when play at end of file.
5.Add buffering progress bar
6.Fix resume bug after seed voice message when connect to AirPods
7.Fix some files that transfer by means of AirDrop can not play when screen locked

1.switch between left playback time and total duration by single tap
2.Spectrum visualizer(Double tap to switch among album image , lyrics and spectrum)
3.remove noise when DSD live conversion
4.fix lyrics and album image not center on iPad

1.fixed a crash when calculate spectrum value
2.fixed a crash when read ape album image
3.When show multiple player view on iPad, each view display its own content separately.

1.fix play error with some SACD(iso) files.
2.other minor error fixed

1. New multi line lyrics layout.
2. Config lyrics text font size
3. Select lyrics line to play
4. Lyrics align by left of center
5. Fix the bug about some album image can’t load from ape file.
